title: Keto Nacho Pizza
instructions: In an extremely hot none stick frying pan, add a handful of cheese. Once brown flip the cheese.
Place the cheese 'pancake' on a chopping board and cut into 6 nacho pieces.
Repeat this process 3 times to make lots of nachos.
Cook the sausages, add in the chopped up onion. Once cooked cut up the sausages.
Place the sundried tomato paste on top of the nachos, then the toppings and cheese.
Cook until the cheese is melted and serve.
